about.name: Jasper Li
about.introdueContent: Hello everyone, my name is Jasper Li. As a web developer with two years of experience, I specialize in RWD (Responsive Web Design) and UI/UX design. I am also skilled in creating databases and integrating backend data using APIs. I am passionate about creating visually appealing and user-friendly websites. Let's work together to create stunning projects!

education.title: Education
education.nkust: National Kaohsiung University of Science and Technology
education.degreeOfNKUST: Master's Degree in Computer and Communication Engineering.
education.contentOfCJCU:
During my studies, I took courses in database design, algorithms, data structures, and mobile app development. I am interested in app development, and for my graduation project, I used Java to develop a Gomoku game Android app.

Starting from my junior year, I spend a lot of time on the ITSA college programming competitions, where I honed my problem-solving skills and gradually became proficient in basic programming syntax.
education.contentOfNKUST:
When I was in my first year of master's degree, I won the Hackathon's Best Market Award for an app that detects road surface bumpy.

When I was in the second year of my master's degree, I worked part-time as an Android App engineer in an electronics company. My work included UI interface development and Bluetooth connection to receive data.

Before graduation, I decided to become a website back-end development engineer as a career.
